story.text: Jan 2 American Israeli Paper Mills Ltd. AIP.TA AIP.A said it sold its leasing rights for a land of about three acres for about 57 million shekels to Arledan Investments Ltd. The company expects to recognize capital profit of about 21 million shekels in the fourth quarter of 2006 related to the sale. The property, which is rented until January 2013, is situated in Ramat Hahayal, the company said in a statement. (Reporting by Ankur Relia in Bangalore)
story.title: american israeli paper says sells leasing rights for a land
